headline: Ataccama names Andrea Eaton CMO to drive global data trust adoption as enterprises prioritize AI and compliance
summary: Eaton to scale go-to-market strategy and drive adoption of Ataccama's unified, agentic data trust platformBOSTON, Dec. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Ataccama, the agentic data trust company, today announced the appointment of Andrea Eaton as Chief Marketing Officer to help lead the company's global go-to-market strategy at a critical juncture as global enterprises accelerate data quality efforts so they can operationalize AI and comply with evolving regulatory standards. Eaton will scale Ataccama
